  • Constructor Details

    • UserRestDAO

      public UserRestDAO()

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public User getUser​(String username)
      Get user information from the database.

      This method should not be used to verify the existence of a user, but to simply load user information.

      Parameters:
      username - The unique username of a user.
      Returns:
      The user with the specified username.
      See Also:
      CredentialsRestDAO.userExists(String)

    • getFriends

      public List<User> getFriends​(String username)
      Loads usernames and full names of friends.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user whose friends to get.
      Returns:
      A list of users who are friends.

    • getFriendsOfFriendWithCommon

      public List<Friend> getFriendsOfFriendWithCommon​(String username, String friendName)
      Load the friends of a friend.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the current user.
      friendName - The username of the friend whose friends to get.
      Returns:
      A list of friends, with the Friend.isMutual() attribute set to true for mutual friends.

    • unfriend

      public void unfriend​(String username, String toUnfriend)
      Removes a friend relation between two users on the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the current user.
      toUnfriend - The username of the user to unfriend.

    • getRequestUsernames

      public List<String> getRequestUsernames​(String username)
      Get all pending friend requests.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to get friend requests for.
      Returns:
      A list usernames of users who sent friend requests.

    • makeRequest

      public void makeRequest​(String sender, String recipient)
      Add a friend request to the database.
      Parameters:
      sender - The username of the user making a friend request.
      recipient - The username of the user to receive the friend request.

    • acceptRequest

      public void acceptRequest​(String sender, String recipient)
      Accept a friend request on the database.
      Parameters:
      sender - The username of the user who made the friend request.
      recipient - The username of the user who received the friend request.

    • rejectRequest

      public void rejectRequest​(String sender, String recipient)
      Reject a friend request on the database.
      Parameters:
      sender - The username of the user who made the friend request.
      recipient - The username of the user who received the friend request.
